name: Yordle Trap
passive: Explosive Entrance: Immobilizing an enemy champion creates an explosion around them after 2 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Health, Armor, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Immobilizing an enemy champion creates an explosion around them after 2 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
Great for champions who take extended trades
Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy physical damage compositions
